snippet: The venture capital firm Khosla Ventures announced it had retained RiceHadleyGates, the consulting firm whose principals include Condoleezza Rice, a former secretary of state.
abstract: The venture capital firm Khosla Ventures announced it had retained RiceHadleyGates, the consulting firm whose principals include Condoleezza Rice, a former secretary of state.
lead_paragraph: The venture capital firm Khosla Ventures announced it had retained RiceHadleyGates, the consulting firm whose principals include Condoleezza Rice, a former secretary of state, to help Khosla achieve strategic goals. “We look forward to putting our network and experience to good use by helping the Khosla companies navigate the tricky waters of political, policy and regulatory issues around the world,” Ms. Rice said in a statement. Read more »

headline.main: Khosla Ventures Teams Up With Condoleezza Rice
